descriptor.name: Green Racer Bio-Pesticide - 100 mL
descriptor.long_desc: Green Racer is a bio-pesticide formulated with Beauveria bassiana, a naturally occurring fungus. It is effective in controlling a wide range of pests, including caterpillars, whiteflies, mealybugs, and aphids. To use, mix the recommended amount of Green Racer in water and apply it to your plants. It is important to follow the instructions on the product label for safe and effective use.
